abstract: Gauging the mix of disruption and transformation under way at a turbulent, and exciting, juncture in human history.
snippet: Gauging the mix of disruption and transformation under way at a turbulent, and exciting, juncture in human history.
lead_paragraph: Tom Friedman has posted a column that considers two views of world events -- one seeing a great disruption, the other an exciting transformation. He ends the piece, not with a conclusion, but by asking readers which narrative they believe. (There's more on the thinkers behind these views below.)

headline.main: Disruption on the Path to Transformation
